§n§2math.MG§r§r
§6§lMinimum Perimeter Rectangles That Enclose Congruent Non-Overlapping Circles§r

§8§oBoris D. Lubachevsky
Ronald L. Graham§r

§72008§r

arXiv:§c§nmath/0412443§r

Journal reference:§1§nDiscrete Mathematics, vol.309 (28 April 2009), 1947-1962§r

Version:§7v4 (Fri, 30 May 2008 09:34:10 GMT)§r

Comments: \u00a77\u00a7oexistence of irregular minimum perimeter packings for n not of the form (10) is conjectured; smallest such n is n=66; existence of irregular minimum area packings isconjectured, e.g. for n=453; locally optimal packings
for the two minimization criteria are conjecturally the same(p.22, line 5); 27 pages, 12 figures\u00a7r
arXiv:math/0508474
